hudson.tasks.Shell.command: git clone https://{{git_username | urlencode}}:{{git_password | urlencode}}@github.ncsu.edu/engr-csc326-staff/iTrust2-v2.git sudo mv /tmp/db.properties iTrust2-v2/iTrust2/src/main/java/db.properties sudo mv /tmp/hibernate.properties iTrust2-v2/iTrust2/src/main/resources/hibernate.properties cd iTrust2-v2/iTrust2/ sudo mvn process-test-classes sudo mvn clean test verify checkstyle:checkstyle
